original_text: The same rule is for the Israelites and for all the foreign people who live among them. That is when it was a mistake.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손 중 본토 소생이든지 그들 중에 거류하는 타국인이든지 누구든 부지중에 범죄한 자에 대한 법이 동일하거니와

sentences.original_text: The same rule is for the Israelites
and for all the foreign people
That is when it was a mistake
